**Government Tender Announcement**
**Reporting Centre - Toronto**
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01004799
**Publication Date:** August 23, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 8, 2022, 2:00 PM
**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
The Correctional Service of Canada, Central Ontario District, is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of a Reporting Centre in the Toronto area.

**Background**
The Reporting Centre is a vital service that provides enhanced supports and interventions to high-risk offenders on parole or Long Term Supervision Order (LTSO) release in the community. The Centre will provide a safe and supportive environment for offenders to access community resources, counseling, and other services to promote their reintegration into society.

**Scope of Work**
The successful supplier will be responsible for providing a Reporting Centre that offers:

* An office site with a large meeting/reception area and separate interview rooms
* Reporting Centre services up to 8 hours per day, 7 days a week, Monday to Sunday
* Two case management workers with experience in delivering correctional programs, case management, and reintegration services
* A team that can provide culturally sensitive and responsive services to diverse offender populations
* Access to community resources and services to support offender reintegration
* Regular meetings with Parole Officers to discuss offender progress and provide case updates

**Evaluation Criteria**
The RFP will be evaluated on the following criteria:

* Technical proposal (30%)
* Operational plan (20%)
* Financial proposal (20%)
* Past performance (10%)
* Bidder's reputation and experience (20%)

**Instructions to Bidders**
Eligible bidders can obtain the complete tender package and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.

**Language of Work**
The Language of work will be English.

**Other**
Please note that the Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement and that documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French). After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

**Contact Information**
For more information, please contact:
Contracting Authority: Monika Alexander
Contact Information: monika.alexander@csc-scc.gc.ca
Phone: 647.234.2934
